channel.title: mysql on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in mysql on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: mysql命令汇总
item.description: 命令汇总 列出一个表的属性列 1 show full columns from table_name; 修改表名 1 rename table old_name to new_name; 导出数据库数据结构和表 1 mysqldump -h 127.0.0.1 -P 3306 -uroot -p123456 test > /media/disk1/gengjianan/sql/db.sql; 修改列名 1 alter table testtable change column address address1
